Articles.Content: No. Hill cools down and I take it back. My Hill.

The hill cools down enough to freeze you to death. I take the hill, being careful not to touch it.

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-08T21:40:08Z" title="06/08/2018 09:40  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 8, 2018</time> by RealKerbal3x**
  
oops wrong page
I warm up the hill. I take it. My Hill.

The warmed up hill causes global warming.

The hill is uninhabited.
I boost the global warming by releasing lots of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere, the hell that the planet becomes allows only me to survive. my hill.
Colonists land and recycle all carbon dioxide into methane. Their <abbr title="In-Situ Resource Utilization">ISRU</abbr> hill.

i convert it into monoprop. 

my massive, methane and monoprop  crater.
I use up the monoprop by using the <abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr> to rotate the vessel. Your hill has no control. My hill.
I unrotate it and take it. My hill.

I destroy the universe

no hill. (i am a universe so my hill)

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-09T12:22:38Z" title="06/09/2018 12:22  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 9, 2018</time> by kerbinorbiter**
I make a new hill and add Ubergun emplacements and a bunker on it. My hill.
my god powers carry over from the previous reality. in other words, you are in deep poo.
I get out of the poo.  My hill. MY HILL!!!!!!!

[*ahem*](https://images.search.yahoo.com/search/images?p=poop+emoji&fr=tightropetb&imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fs-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com%2F736x%2F82%2F5c%2F28%2F825c28f236475ed7b9e269f0bdd6760f--poop-emoji-cake-poop-emoji-party.jpg#id=12&iurl=https%3A%2F%2Fs-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com%2F736x%2F82%2F5c%2F28%2F825c28f236475ed7b9e269f0bdd6760f--poop-emoji-cake-poop-emoji-party.jpg&action=click) I have added hyper edit my long list of powers.

\*Jool is being shot at you at light speed.\*

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-09T14:38:25Z" title="06/09/2018 02:38  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 9, 2018</time> by Fraston**
I have hyperedit too. I shoot the SUN at you. My hill!
I destroy the universe with my death MACHI-ne
The Sun doesn't affect me. i do[this](https://youtu.be/v8cVbu6n7kc?t=4m31s) to you.

I SHOOT All the outer planets at you. My hill.

Edit: List? Jool, Sarnus, Sarvin, Urlum, Keelon, Neidon

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-09T14:46:45Z" title="06/09/2018 02:46  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 9, 2018</time> by The Minmus Derp**
  
Plernerts.

none of those effect me. i am attempting to do that in an infinite loop.

(you watched that scene, right?)
I move to Laythe and build a hill. You get my old hill. My hill. NOTE: You can pick which hill to fight. I then build a mass driver so I can shoot FTL missiles at you.
A tidal wave washes out the hill.

I mix the dispersed particles of the hill together and solidify it.

My reconstituted hill.

Particles get disabled in settings.

Unsolidified hill.

i find a new hill and do [this](https://youtu.be/TxrEWl5AkpA?list=LLOyWC_cw_9T6jj2LM6zMLYA&t=967)

my hill

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-09T20:37:20Z" title="06/09/2018 08:37  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 9, 2018</time> by Machi**
I move to Plock and make a hill and put a bunch of big guns on it and a mass driver to shoot FTL missiles. My hill.
